openadk.library.impl
Class DataObjectOutputStreamImpl

java.lang.Object
  openadk.library.impl.DataObjectOutputStreamImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataObjectOutputStream, BaseObjectOutputStream
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataObjectOutputFileStream, ReportObjectOutputStreamImpl
public abstract class DataObjectOutputStreamImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataObjectOutputStream, BaseObjectOutputStream

The abstract base class for OutputStreams to which Publishers write the results of a query. Although this class has a generic name that might imply it is a generic output stream for SIFDataObjects, it is really very specific to SIF_Request processing and is not intended to be used generically.

Version:
ADK 1.0
Author:
Eric Petersen

newInstance

public static DataObjectOutputStreamImpl newInstance()
                                              throws ADKException
Construct a new DataObjectOutputStream

Returns:
A new DataObjectOutputStream object, which will always be a an instanceof DataObjectOutputStreamImpl as defined by the adkglobal.factory.DataObjectOutputStream system property.
Throws:
ADKException

initialize

public abstract void initialize(Zone zone,
                                Query query,
                                java.lang.String requestSourceId,
                                java.lang.String requestMsgId,
                                SIFVersion requestSIFMessageVersion,
                                int maxSize)
                         throws ADKException
Description copied from interface: BaseObjectOutputStream
Initialize the output stream. This method must be called after creating a new instance of this class and before writing any SIFDataObjects to the stream.

Specified by:
initialize in interface BaseObjectOutputStream
Parameters:
zone - The Zone associated with messages that will be written to the stream
query - The Query object to use as a source for any SIF_Element filter restrictions that might be placed on this SIF_Response
requestSourceId - The SourceId of the associated SIF_Request message
requestMsgId - The MsgId of the associated SIF_Request message
requestSIFMessageVersion - The version of the SIF_Message envelope of the SIF_Request message
maxSize - The maximum size of rendered SIFDataObject that will be accepted by this stream. If a SIFDataObject is written to the stream and its size exceeds this value after rendering the object to an XML stream, an ObjectTooLargeException will be thrown by the write method
Throws:
ADKException

Initialize the output stream. This method must be called after creating a new instance of this class and before writing any SIFDataObjects to the stream.

Specified by:
initialize in interface BaseObjectOutputStream
Parameters:
zone - The Zone associated with messages that will be written to the stream
queryRestrictions - Any field restrictions that were specified in the SIF_Request message. Call Query.getFieldRestrictions() to obtain this array.
requestSourceId - The SourceId of the associated SIF_Request message
requestMsgId - The MsgId of the associated SIF_Request message
requestSIFMessageVersion - The version of the SIF_Message envelope of the SIF_Request message
maxSize - The maximum size of rendered SIFDataObject that will be accepted by this stream. If a SIFDataObject is written to the stream and its size exceeds this value after rendering the object to an XML stream, an ObjectTooLargeException will be thrown by the write method
